title: LAGSHIAN Women's Elegant Bodycon Off Shoulder Sleeveless High Split Ruched Long Formal Evening Dress
description: Fabric: This cocktail party dress is exquisitely crafted, with a soft and comfortable touch, soft and breathable, high elasticity, not see through and skin-friendly.

Design: This off shoulder pleated design, paired with a gemstone necklace, showcases your beautiful neck and collarbone. The waist fold design hides excess belly, and the ruffled high slit design showcases long legs, making it easy for you to walk around and become a star at parties.

Style:This formal wedding guest dress is unique in style, with off the shoulder, high split fishtail design, both thin and temperament; elegant, fashion and feminine design,make you stand out in the crowd.

Occasion: Evening dresses, cocktail parties, parties, prom, dating, graduations, galas, ball, weddings, bridesmaid dresses, birthday parties, portraits and other important formal occasions can be worn. Suitable with heels and jewelry ,winter suitable windbreaker or woolen coat.

Size(US):S(4-6):length:52.4 bust:30.5 waist:24.8 hip:35.8 ,M(8-10):length:52.8 bust:32.9 waist:27.2 hip:38.2,L(12-14):length:53.1 bust:35.6 waist:29.9 hip:40.9,XL(16-18):length:53.5 bust:38.4 waist:32.7 hip:43.7, Please select the size which is more suitable for yourself.
